markdownRemark.html:
Stan switched web browsers for the day, so he and Jon kick off the episode talking about that. That leads into office type suites, to financial apps to budgeting. Listen in to a typical conversation of Stan Lemon and Jon Kohlmeier. .mp3/twistoflemonpod.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/episodes/

References

Refinery29 - A Week in New York City on $25/hour

Dave Ramsey 7 Baby Steps
